meanings.definition: Having the shape of a wedge.
meanings.sent1: The doorstop was the wedgiest object in the room.
meanings.sent2: The cake was cut into the wedgiest slices for the party guests.
meanings.sent3: The wedgiest piece of cheese was perfect for making grilled cheese sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The wedgiest rock in the collection stood out among the smooth stones.
meanings.sent5: The wedgiest piece of wood was used to secure the wobbly table.

meanings.sent1: The wedgiest shoe in the store was perfect for my wide feet.
meanings.sent2: The wedgiest building in the city had a unique triangular design.
meanings.sent3: The wedgiest slice of pizza was so small, it looked like a mini triangle.
meanings.sent4: The wedgiest piece of paper was easy to slide under the door.
meanings.sent5: The wedgiest piece of cake was the first to be eaten at the party.
